children.text: Hide tutorial and start the game.
Check for valid conditions to start the game.

children.name: BG_ROAD_RATE
children.comment: The rate at which the road's offset changes.

children.name: BG_P0_RATE
children.comment: The rate at which the parallax P0's offset changes.

children.name: BG_P1_RATE
children.comment: The rate at which the parallax P1's offset changes.

children.name: BG_P2_RATE
children.comment: The rate at which the parallax P2's offset changes.

children.text: Set animation according to X and Y axes.
If the player is holding Ctrl, do not move, just aim.
Player fires automatically when a direction is pressed.
If the player is overlapping a threat, they get hit.

actions.text: Make player immune for a brief period.
Flash the player and the UI.

children.text: Prevent player from camping below the boss.
Go from the left to the right.
Go from the right to the left.
Boss got hit by a bullet.

actions.text: Spawn the shockwave charge ball and set its initial properties.

children.text: Once the shockwave charge ball hits the floor, destroy it and create the shockwave.

parameters.angle: anglelerp(Self.Bullet.AngleOfMotion, angle(Self.X, Self.Y, Player.X, Player.Y), 1.15 * dt)

actions.text: Create and animate beam charge ball.
Move beam charge to the top.

children.text: After certain animations finish, go back to idle.
When the sting animation finishes, the boss chooses a random side of the screen.
Muzzle flashes are destroyed whenever they finish animating.
Explosions are destroyed whenever they finish animating.
Adjust the opacity of the player's shadow according to the distance.
Adjust the opacity of the boss' shadow according to the distance.
When a player bullet is destroyed, setup the corresponding bullet hit animation.
Bullets are destroyed when they hit the road collider.
Player lost the fight against the boss.

children.functionDescription: Player lost the fight against the boss

actions.text: Disable all bullets and make boss immune.
Make player immune to futher damage.
Move player's sprite outside of the screen.
Make the sprite the parent of the shadow.

children.text: Player won the fight against the boss.

children.functionDescription: Player won the fight against the boss

actions.text: Disable all bullets and make boss immune.
Make player immune to futher damage.
